snippet: Christine C. Quinn, appearing on "The Rachel Maddow Show," said the Pentagon should reverse itself and allow New York City to hold a parade honoring veterans of Iraq.
abstract: Christine C. Quinn, appearing on "The Rachel Maddow Show," said the Pentagon should reverse itself and allow New York City to hold a parade honoring veterans of Iraq.

headline.main: Council  Speaker Endorses Parade for Iraq Veterans on Talk Show
